book_overview.premise: In the heart of suburban Kansas City, 9-year-old Emma Kowalski transforms thrift store finds into sustainable fashion, but blending sounds eludes her—until her designs weave phonics into patterns, frustration morphing into mastery as she struts her stuff and teaches her blended family and friends the art of sound fusion.

name_age_background.name: Emma Kowalski
name_age_background.background: White girl of Polish descent in a blended family in suburban Kansas City, Missouri, lower-middle class
name_age_background.struggle: Specific gap in blending consonant-vowel-consonant (CVC) sounds

personality_traits: Creative and passionate about their interest
Resilient when pursuing what they love
Kind-hearted but sometimes defensive about difficulties
protagonist_profile.passion: Sustainable upcycling fashion trends dominating youth culture via social media in 2025
protagonist_profile.growth_arc: Emma struggles to blend simple sounds in reading groups, causing creative blocks and tears; a design mishap sparks blending insight; she achieves mastery and hosts a fashion show teaching blending to neighborhood kids

mentor_guide.personality: Patient, encouraging, sees potential in protagonist
mentor_guide.function: Provides explicit instruction and connects passion to skill

peer_group.description: 3-4 diverse classmates with varying learning profiles
peer_group.function: Normalize struggles, provide collaboration opportunities, show different paths

parallel_adult.starting_belief: Worried about protagonist's struggles, potentially fixed mindset

secondary_setting.primary: Suburban home workshop in Kansas City
secondary_setting.secondary: Enchanted 'fabric fusion attic' where clothes come to life with sound effects

setting_description.sensory_details: Vivid descriptions of creative spaces, technology, peer interactions
setting_description.memorable_elements: Her upcycled outfits start 'speaking' blended words when worn, turning the runway into an interactive phonics parade

contemporary_hook_integration.hook: Sustainable upcycling fashion trends dominating youth culture via social media in 2025
contemporary_hook_integration.story_function: Emma's upcycling fashion designs label fabrics with CVC words, blending sounds as she mixes patterns, making literacy a creative craft
contemporary_hook_integration.why_kids_care: Connects to current interests and aspirations of 9-10 year olds in 2025
contemporary_hook_integration.authenticity: Protagonist's genuine passion, not a gimmick

progression: Discovery: Connection between passion and skill revealed
Practice: Deliberate work integrated with creative activity
educational_integration_plan.teaching_moments: Explicit instruction scenes with mentor, systematic skill building
educational_integration_plan.creative_activity_connection: Emma's upcycling fashion designs label fabrics with CVC words, blending sounds as she mixes patterns, making literacy a creative craft
